title.cn: 冰美式 产品大片 #1

prompts.description: Vertical 9:16, 8 seconds, 5 cuts. Recreate a premium product-only short video for Luckin Coffee: Iced Americano. Setting: modern minimalist desk with Luckin blue accents. Camera: macro slider push-in. Lighting: natural warm window light with cool blue fill. Motion: condensation beads form and roll slowly. Deep focus F/11+, full-frame sharp, no bokeh. No people, no faces, no hands, no on-screen text.
prompts.lighting: natural warm window light with cool blue fill
prompts.setting: modern minimalist desk with Luckin blue accents
elements: Luckin Coffee Iced Americano cup/packaging (logo visible)
clean glass ice cubes / coffee liquid

shot_list.desc: Scroll-stopper macro of brand blue element + cup edge; highlight texture
Hero product center frame; slow camera move; condensation/steam visible
Dynamic action beat (pour / ice / rotation) matched to audio hit
Detail close-ups: lid snap / logo emboss / foam texture; no text
Final clean hero shot with blue-white background; subtle motion continues

prompts.motion: condensation beads form and roll slowly
prompts.ending: clean hero product frame, subtle continuous motion, text: none
prompts.audio: modern upbeat pop or crisp ASMR (ice, pour, lid snap), no voiceover
